data.comment: David Webb starts the match. Millwall with the kick-off in Bristol.
Tom Bradshaw is on target to give Millwall a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 45, David Webb blows to end the first-half.
David Webb blows to start the second-half. Bristol City with the kick-off.
Callum O'Dowda is replacing Adrian Mariappa for Bristol City at Ashton Gate.
In the minute 59, The home team have replaced Adam Nagy with Famara Diedhiou. This is the second substitution made today by Dean Holden.
Goal! Mason Bennett extends Millwall's lead to 0-2.
Famara Diedhiou for Bristol City has been booked by David Webb and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 73, Millwall make their first substitution with Scott Malone replacing Mason Bennett.
The home team replace Tomas Kalas with Antoine Semenyo.
Famara Diedhiou has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
In the minute 80, Ben Thompson is replacing Tom Bradshaw for the away team.
Gary Rowett (Millwall) is making a third substitution, with Ryan Woods replacing Shaun Williams.
Han-Noah Massengo (Bristol City) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 88, Opi Edwards is on a sub for Chris Martin for Bristol City.
The match has come to a close in Bristol. The final score is 0-2.
Gary Rowett is making the team's fourth substitution at Ashton Gate with Matt Smith replacing Jon Dadi BÃ¶dvarsson.
